00001 /********************************************************************************************************
00002 
00003 Copyright (C) 2008 Deepak Chandran
00004 contact: dchandran1@gmail.com
00005 
00006         This library provides the basic functions for running a Genetic Algorithm (GA), but
00007         the user is required to setup the fitness function and related functions.
00008         
00009         The user MUST define:
00010                 1) a struct that represents an "individual"
00011                 2) a function that returns the fitness of an individual
00012                 3) a mutation function that randomly alters an individual
00013                 4) a function to free an individual
00014                 5) a function to clone an individual
00015         
00016         The following function definition is optional but highly recommended:
00017                 1) a crossover function to make a new individual from two individuals
00018         
00019         The following functions definitions are entirely optional:
00020                 1) A function that selects individuals using fitness as probabilities (library provides one by default)
00021                 2) A callback function can be used to examine or terminate the GA at any iteration
00022                 
00023         The main functions are: GAinit and GArun
00024         
00025 *********************************************************************************************************/
00026 #ifndef GA_MAIN_LOOP
00027 #define GA_MAIN_LOOP
00028 
00029 #include <stdio.h>
00030 #include <stdlib.h>
00031 #include <math.h>
00032 #include "mtrand.h"
00033 
00035 typedef void* GAindividual;
00036 
00038 typedef GAindividual* GApopulation;
00039 
00040 /***********************************************************
00041     @name Required externally defined functions
00042     The following functions MUST be defined somewhere
00043         use initGA to initialize the GA with the functions
00044 ************************************************************/
00045 
00051 typedef void (*GADeleteFnc)(GAindividual);
00057 typedef GAindividual (*GACloneFnc)(GAindividual);
00064 typedef double(*GAFitnessFnc)(GAindividual);
00065 
00066 /***********************************************************
00067     @name Mutation and crossover functions
00068     At least ONE of the following two functions SHOULD
00069         be defined, otherwise the GA will run, but nothing will evolve.
00070 ************************************************************/
00071 
00079 typedef GAindividual (*GACrossoverFnc)(GAindividual, GAindividual);
00086 typedef GAindividual (*GAMutateFnc)(GAindividual);
00087 
00088 /***********************************************************
00089   @name Optional functions
00090   The following two functions are entirely optional. 
00091   The GA library provides default Selection Function, 
00092   which can be overwritten
00093   They may or may not affect the GA performance 
00094 *************************************************************/
00095 
00105 typedef int(*GASelectionFnc)(GApopulation , double * , double , int );
00115 typedef int(*GACallbackFnc)(int iter,GApopulation,int popSz);
00116 
00117 /***********************************************************
00118   @name The main GA functions
00119   The central functions defined in this genetic algorithm library
00120 ************************************************************/
00121 
00131 void GAinit(GADeleteFnc, GACloneFnc ,GAFitnessFnc, GACrossoverFnc, GAMutateFnc, GASelectionFnc);
00132 
00142 GApopulation GArun(GApopulation,int sz0,int sz1,int maxIter, GACallbackFnc);
00143 
00144 /***********************************************************
00145   @name Available selection functions
00146 ************************************************************/
00147 
00155 int GArouletteWheelSelection(GApopulation , double * , double , int );
00163 int GAtournamentSelection(GApopulation , double * , double , int );
00171 int GAeliteSelection(GApopulation , double * , double , int );
00172 
00173 /***********************************************************
00174   @name Convenience functions -- substitute for GAinit
00175 ************************************************************/
00181 void GAsetupNewStruct(GADeleteFnc, GACloneFnc);
00186 void GAsetFitnessFunction(GAFitnessFnc);
00191 void GAsetCrossoverFunction(GACrossoverFnc);
00196 void GAsetMutationFunction(GAMutateFnc);
00201 void setSelectionFunction(GASelectionFnc);
00202 
00203 /***********************************************************
00204   @name functions that are being used by the GA
00205 ************************************************************/
00206 
00211 GAFitnessFnc GAgetFitnessFunction();
00216 GACrossoverFnc GAgetCrossoverFunction();
00221 GAMutateFnc GAgetMutationFunction();
00226 GASelectionFnc GAgetSelectionFunction();
00227 
00228 /***********************************************************
00229   @name Helper functions used by GArun
00230 ************************************************************/
00231 
00240 GApopulation GAnextGen(GApopulation,int,int,short);
00241 
00249 void GAsort(GApopulation, GAFitnessFnc, int);
